abilities.name: Iron Resolve
abilities.description: Increases physical defense by 20% and reduces the duration of crowd control effects.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description: Bashes the enemy with a shield, dealing damage and stunning them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Battle Cry
abilities.description: Emits a powerful shout that increases nearby allies' attack power by 15% for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Increases movement speed by 10% and reduces enemy detection range while sneaking.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Teleports behind an enemy and deals massive critical damage if undetected.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Creates a cloud of smoke, breaking line of sight and granting invisibility for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Mastery
abilities.description: Reduces mana cost of spells by 15% and increases spell power slightly.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Launches a fiery projectile that explodes on impact, dealing area damage.

abilities.name: Frost Barrier
abilities.description: Summons a shield of ice that absorbs damage and slows attackers.

abilities.name: Eagle Eye
abilities.description: Increases ranged attack range and critical hit chance by 10%.

abilities.name: Multi-Shot
abilities.description: Fires multiple arrows in a cone, hitting all enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a powerful arrow that pierces through enemies, ignoring armor.

abilities.name: Soul Leech
abilities.description: Restores a small portion of health when enemies nearby die.

abilities.name: Raise Dead
abilities.description: Summons undead minions from fallen enemies to fight for a short duration.

abilities.name: Death Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies toward the caster and briefly immobilizes them.
